english.segment1: You are the only one that brings me peace. You are the only one where hope is seen. The mercy you've given is more than I deserve. So I lay it down so I can heed your word
english.segment2: Hear my voice, I raise to you. With honor and praise. All glory is due. I lay it all down at your feet. With lifted hands it's you we seek
english.segment3: You are the only one that bring me truth. You are the only one that makes me new. The grace you've given a gift for all to see. So this is why I give you everything
english.segment4: And to you I lift my voice. And to you I lift my hands. And to you I give my heart
